body: Same scene as my profile. Such a coincidence💀
Thank You for the honesty and doing this vital work. I am truly grateful.
This series has 18 chaps up to now, but the raws have been uploaded out of order by the people who did it, I plan to upload the english translations in the correct order
Whats the order for this series? anyone?
Salute to you for translating kind sir

Personally even I find the Ma'am thing silly, but the literal translation from the true word used to refer to her is Okusan which just means wife, it looked weird with the NTR old man yelling "WIFE! WIFE!"

I am willing to re-translate the chaps that have been already translated since they seem to be very badly translated even for my half-assed knowledge of japanese, but my goal for now is to do the untranslated stuff first

Oh also the other parts that are already translated by other people:
PART1:[ https://nhentai.net/g/381047/ ] PART2: [ https://nhentai.net/g/382197/ ] PART3:[ https://nhentai.net/g/369775/ ] and PART8: [ https://nhentai.net/g/340509/ ]

Hey it worked, I managed to get it to appear here in Nhentai, now can someone inform me the hell can I upload loli and shota stuff? Cause E-hentai does not let me, where does Nhentai get all of the loli stuff from so I can upload there with the hopes of it appearing here and other sites
You know mouth is considered still penetration
